information.85: Principle 1 - Accountability. An organization is responsible for personal information under its control. It must appoint someone to be accountable for its compliance with these fair information principles.

information.86: Principle 2 - Identifying Purposes. The purposes for which the personal information is being collected must be identified by the organization before or at the time of collection.

information.87: Principle 3 - Consent. The knowledge and consent of the individual are required for the collection, use, or disclosure of personal information, except where inappropriate.

information.88: Principle 4 - Limiting Collection. The collection of personal information must be limited to that which is needed for the purposes identified by the organization. Information must be collected by fair and lawful means.

information.89: Principle 5 - Limiting Use, Disclosure, and Retention. Unless the individual consents otherwise or it is required by law, personal information can only be used or disclosed for the purposes for which it was collected. Personal information must only be kept as long as required to serve those purposes.

information.90: Principle 6 - Accuracy.Personal information must be as accurate, complete, and up-to-date as possible in order to properly satisfy the purposes for which it is to be used.

information.91: Principle 7 - Safeguards. Personal information must be protected by appropriate security relative to the sensitivity of the information.

information.92: Principle 8 - Openness. An organization must make detailed information about its policies and practices relating to the management of personal information publicly and readily available.

information.93: Principle 9 - Individual Access. Upon request, an individual must be informed of the existence, use, and disclosure of their personal information and be given access to that information. Protecting Students and their Personal InformationQuizizz believes the personally identifiable information of children and students deserves special protections and we comply with the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (“COPPA”), the general consumer data privacy and student advertising limitation laws of US states and The General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”). We also assist schools in meeting their obligations pursuant to the Family Educational Rights Privacy Act (“FERPA”). Quizizz offers a limited feature set and website experience for young users of Quizizz. We do not require students to submit their name or contact information, nor do we require them to create accounts. When a student indicates that they are under the age when they can grant consent on their own, Quizizz does not collect personal information as defined under COPPA and may take additional steps to safeguard student privacy as required by law. Except as described in this privacy policy, Quizizz does not accumulate personal information about any child for distribution, sharing, or selling.Here are some examples of safety and privacy measures on Quizizz: Students do not receive behaviorally targeted advertising.Students can join games without creating an account.The platform does not facilitate direct messaging between students.Quizzes are subject to proactive content filters and reactive reporting tools.Section 2. Parental Rights and ConsentsQuizizz empowers parents and legal guardians of children younger than the age of consent (in the U.S., this means under 13) who have registered accounts with Quizizz, to exercise their legal rights pursuant to legislation such as COPPA. Currently, the only personally identifiable information we collect from a child younger than the age of consent in any of the jurisdictions we operate in is their parent's or guardian’s email address. We may also collect a student’s first name, which alone is generally not PII but may be considered personal information in a generic sense.

Parents/guardians may delete, modify, and review information their children shared with Quizizz by accessing their child's account. They may also create a parent account to manage their child’s access to Quizizz. Parents may also request that Quizizz delete that information and refuse to allow Quizizz to collect further information from their children by deleting their account at quizizz.com/settings or otherwise contacting us at privacy@quizizz.com. information.3: We prioritize child data protection. We respect the consent of individuals under 13 and give you the power to control your information for added security and peace of mind.

information.4: Quizizz is ISO/IEC 27001:2022 certified. This certification demonstrates our adherence to international standards for information security management, ensuring that we have robust policies, procedures, and controls in place to manage risks and safeguard your data. This global recognition underscores our dedication to maintaining the highest level of data protection for our users. Learn more by reading our help article.

information.5: Accounts are not a prerequisite to using Quizizz, but are required to access some features and to save progress over time. If a student account is created, saved information will include things like an email address, a parent or guardian email address (in limited cases), first name, and last name.

information.6: Data is never sold or rented to third parties. Quizizz only shares your personal information when it is necessary to offer the service, comply with law, or with your permission. For example, it may be shared with limited third-party services essential for Quizizz's operation, but these services can't use your information for other purposes. A comprehensive list of service providers can be found here.

information.7: We will retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. In most cases, we delete user accounts if they have been inactive for more than twelve months. If you have an account, you can update or delete it any time at quizizz.com/settings

information.8: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption to protect your data both in transit and at rest. This ensures that your personal information remains secure and private.

information.9: Quizizz is committed to ensuring that our platform is accessible to all users, including those with disabilities. We follow the Voluntary Product Accessibility Template (VPAT) guidelines, which document our compliance with accessibility standards such as Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act and the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG). Our VPAT details the ways in which Quizizz meets these standards and is available upon request here. For more information, please visit our accessibility and inclusion statement.

information.10: You have the right to delete, access, update, correct errors in, and export for transfer any of your personal information. You may delete your account or update your information at any time by visiting quizizz.com/settings

information.11: Parents and guardians can log in to their child’s account and have the right to delete or update their child’s information at any time by visiting quizizz.com/settings

information.12: More questions? Access our Privacy Policy or Help Center for further information.

use.0: Millions of people around the world use Quizizz to learn. We know that trust is a huge part of every learner’s journey, so we take the trust and privacy of our educators, students, and families seriously every step of the way.We are committed to transparency and putting you in control of how we use your information, so you can navigate Quizizz with peace of mind.We are dedicated to this work and guided by three core principles:

use.1: Data is never sold or rented to third parties. Quizizz only shares your personal information when it is necessary to offer the service, comply with law, or with your permission. For example, it may be shared with limited third-party services essential for Quizizz's operation, but these services can't use your information for other purposes. A comprehensive list of service providers can be found here.

use.2: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption to protect your data both in transit and at rest. This ensures that your personal information remains secure and private.

use.3: Engaging every student starts with trust. We use technical, operational, and logical security measures to keep student data safe. Learn about these measures here.

use.4: Quizizz AI solely uses the inputs teachers provide to generate content for your lessons and quizzes. Just like the rest of Quizizz, we keep your and your students' personal data untouched. OpenAI does not use any of your personal data for training its models. We retain the content you input solely to generate quizzes and provide you with the best possible results. Additionally, Quizizz AI checks for copyrights before using publicly available material.

use.5: When should I use Quizizz AI Enhance?

use.6: After you've generated a quiz using Quizizz AI, you can use Quizizz AI Enhance on your generated questions. Either enhance individually or enhance entire AI-generated quizzes. You can convert your multiple-choice questions to other types like fill-in-the-blank or drag-and-drop questions!

use.7: Refreshing your old quizzes: If you're the kind that already has a lot of Quizzes saved in their library, don't waste time updating them for the new school year or for new assessments. Just use Quizizz AI Enhance to refresh them as needed! Automatically personalize your quizzes with student names, add themes to them to fit in with the theme of your classroom, and add answer explanations wherever needed!

use.8: Browsing the Quizizz Library: When you find a quiz that seems like it might fit what you're looking for but isn't yet perfect for your classroom and diverse student needs, use Quizizz AI Enhance to customize it! Translate it for ESL students, change the difficulty level, add more challenging questions or simplify them to create assessments with differentiation, convert it to real-world scenarios to engage students, or create different versions of your quiz all in a few seconds!

use.9: What are the best practices that I should apply to my use of Quizizz AI (beta)?

use.10: Do not use Quizizz AI to generate harmful content, infringe any third party rights, or defame anyone

use.11: How is Quizizz AI moderated to ensure safe use?

use.12: Student security, privacy, and digital citizenship remain top priorities for Quizizz, with AI tools exclusively for teacher, not student, use and a company-wide commitment to responsible AI that minimizes bias and hate speech.Our system includes automated reviews of input prompts, scanning for terms that might trigger inappropriate content. Additionally, GPT-4's inherent guardrails play a significant role in keeping outputs and users in check.

data.0: How does Quizizz protect student data?

data.1: Engaging every student starts with trust. We use technical, operational, and logical security measures to keep student data safe. Here are a few examples:

data.2: Privacy-centered design means that students can use Quizizz without creating accounts or sharing PII unless required to use a specific feature such as saving progress to a profile. Student accounts and all relevant personal data may also be deleted at any time.

data.3: To keep your personal data secure, all data is encrypted in transit, and we maintain up-to-date certificates with a verified third-party provider—DigiCert.

data.4: Data is stored in access-controlled data centers with 24/7 monitoring by AWS, an industry-leading provider.

data.5: Data is stored redundantly and is geographically distributed in order to maximize uptime and allow our team to restore access to your data in the event of an incident.
